input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item keywords and item specification information.

Item specification:
Graduation Scene Backdrop - Size 6 Ft. X 6 Ft.

Item keywords:
Perfect for graduation party
Use it for your picture wall
Ready to Hang
Size - 6 ft x 6ft.
input_text.Response A: Step up your graduation party game with our Graduation Scene Backdrop! Measuring in at a whopping 6ft x 6ft, this backdrop is the perfect size for your photo booth or to simply add some extra pizazz to your decor. With its ready-to-hang design, you can get this backdrop up in a snap and start taking photos immediately. Whether you're using it for your picture wall or just as a decorative piece, this backdrop is sure to impress. So don't settle for boring graduation party decor, upgrade to our Graduation Scene Backdrop today!
input_text.Response B: CafePress brings your passions to life with the perfect item for every occasion. With thousands of designs to choose from, you are certain to find the unique item you've been seeking. Travel in style with this cloth tote bag, professionally printed with your favorite design. These quality natural canvas hand bags are durable, professionally printed, and will satisfy all your reusable shopping bag needs. Also perfect as a beach tote, grocery bag, or book bag, these bags make great gifts for teachers or students, or treat yourself! The small is 15"x15" with 26.5" sturdy reinforced fabric handles and the medium measures 15"x18"x6" with 22" a reinforced fabric handle. Machine wash cold inside out with like colors and tumble dry low for easy and convenient care. And with CafePress, your satisfaction is always our promise...buy with confidence, as we offer easy returns and exchanges and a 100% money back guarantee.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
